meanings.definition: Preferring or thriving in high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The thermophilous plants in the desert can withstand the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The lizard is thermophilous and enjoys basking in the warm sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The thermophilous cactus decided to take a vacation to the equator for even hotter weather.
meanings.sent4: Her thermophilous personality always keeps her warm and welcoming to others.
meanings.sent5: The thermophilous volcano erupted with intense heat and power.

meanings.definition: Organisms that thrive in high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The thermophilous near the hot springs are adapted to the extreme heat.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study thermophilous to understand how life can survive in such high temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The thermophilous at the sauna were the first to suggest turning up the heat.
meanings.sent4: The thermophilous bacteria in the geysers are like tiny heat-loving superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The thermophilous thrive in the fiery depths of the Earth, where others cannot survive.
